This site is owned, run and managed by Burke Insurances Ltd which was established by Jack Burke in April 1965. It is providing an insurance broker service, both locally and nationally, throughout Ireland.

 

Over the last ten years, the business has acquired the practices of a number of other insurance brokers and is today a leading provider of insurance services in its region and nationally in the areas of Public Liability Insurance, Professional Indemnity Insurance, Online Office insurance and other medical technology insurance and IT Insurance.

 

The firm is a founding member of the Irish Brokers Association and has a proven commitment to quality. Its knowledgeable staff are focused on customer satisfaction which translates into long term profitable and mutually beneficial relationships for all concerned.
